Image Generation Prompt: Chandelier made of plastic water bottles, illuminated
Steps:
```html
  1. Clean and dry the plastic water bottles and remove any existing labels.
  2. Cut the plastic water bottles to desired shapes and sizes, creating components for the chandelier structure. This may involve removing the bottom portion of some bottles.
  3. Attach the cut bottle pieces together using strong adhesive, creating a frame that mimics the shape of a chandelier.
  4. Attach the plastic bottle caps to the bottle pieces, if needed to secure joints or add design elements.
  5. Wrap the paper labels around the bottles or cut and attach sections to decorate and cover some areas of the structure.
  6. Attach a pre-existing chandelier chain or create one from additional recycled materials (not provided in the list) to hang the structure.
```
